ValidationRule.description: Ensures that products marked as new business have a provider of either NOVA Wealth or a partner company
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT( Public_Provider_Name__r.OW_own_company__c ) && NOT( Public_Provider_Name__r.PartnerCompany__c ) && ISPICKVAL( BusinessType__c, 'New business') && NOT( CONTAINS(TEXT(Subtype__c) , "Cover") || CONTAINS(TEXT(Subtype__c) , "Life") || CONTAINS(TEXT(Subtype__c) , "Income") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To be a new business product, it must be provided by a company which is either NOVA or one of our partners
